Package com.intellij.openapi.editor

Interface StripTrailingSpacesFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PsiBasedStripTrailingSpacesFilter, SmartStripTrailingSpacesFilter

    public interface StripTrailingSpacesFilter
    Allows to suppress stripping spaces from some lines or from entire document when the document is being saved and "Settings|Editor|General|Strip trailing spaces on save" option is not "None".
    See Also:
    StripTrailingSpacesFilterFactory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static StripTrailingSpacesFilter ALL_LINES
      The filter which does not put any restrictions on trailing spaces removal.
      static StripTrailingSpacesFilter ENFORCED_REMOVAL
      Forcibly allows all trailing spaces to be removed regardless of other filters.
      static StripTrailingSpacesFilter NOT_ALLOWED
      The filter which completely prohibits removing trailing spaces from a document regardless of other filters.
      static StripTrailingSpacesFilter POSTPONED
      Tells that strip trailing spaces is not currently possible since some conditions are not met for proper document processing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isStripSpacesAllowedForLine(int line) 

    • Field Detail

      • NOT_ALLOWED

        static final StripTrailingSpacesFilter NOT_ALLOWED
        The filter which completely prohibits removing trailing spaces from a document regardless of other filters.

      • POSTPONED

        static final StripTrailingSpacesFilter POSTPONED
        Tells that strip trailing spaces is not currently possible since some conditions are not met for proper document processing. The filter will force another attempt to strip trailing spaces later regardless of other filters.

      • ALL_LINES

        static final StripTrailingSpacesFilter ALL_LINES
        The filter which does not put any restrictions on trailing spaces removal. Other filters may be taken into account.

      • ENFORCED_REMOVAL

        static final StripTrailingSpacesFilter ENFORCED_REMOVAL
        Forcibly allows all trailing spaces to be removed regardless of other filters. The actual removal depends only on provided options.

    • Method Detail

      • isStripSpacesAllowedForLine

        boolean isStripSpacesAllowedForLine(int line)
        Parameters:
        line - The document line. Lines are from 0 to Document.getLineCount() - 1 inclusive.
        Returns:
        True if trailing spaces can be removed from the line, false otherwise.
